channel.title: How do I make my own NPC?
channel.description: I am wondering how I can make my own npc, I have tired making one in the npcdef,and tried putting him in my location, i get the npc to my location, and it is the same npc as a original one,I want to change his combat level, and name of the npc and description, If someone could be so kind as to help me :)

item.title: How do I make my own NPC?
item.dc:creator: @liquidazer liquidazer
item.description:
@liquidazer wrote:

lol do you even know what NPChandlers.xml is used for…?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @liquidazer liquidazer

@liquidazer wrote:

I have noticed this when I am trying to change the NPCdef, nothing changes… might not be compressing it correctly but I take the same steps as I do with every other xml file and nothing changes.

item.title: How do I make my own NPC?
item.dc:creator: @wesely wesely
item.description:
@wesely wrote:

Yes, I have and it is using the same npc as before, even though i’ve changed the name, description, and bonuses it has on it,The combat level of the npc is the same,The name and the description, are all the same, Ive compressed the file, then compiled my server, run it, and found it is the same npc as before.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2009, 12:05:27 pm[/size][hr]What im trying to do is like make a boss npc like the kbd, but i want this npc to be used and it wont change the original npcs, name, description,and combat level, i have put him in my location but nothing works.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make my own NPC?
